name: Pximg Proxy
description: A reverse proxy service for i.pximg.net

PROTOCOL.description: Specify the protocol of example URLs on index page. It may be useful when you are using a HTTPS CDN.

PIXIV_WEB_COOKIE.description: Pixiv website cookie, only the PHPSESSID part is required. At least one of this and refersh token need to be set.

PIXIV_CLIENT_REFRESH_TOKEN.description: Pixiv client refersh token, can get by npm pixiv:login script.
